message: Hi Bob, I'm Alice. I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $10,000. I believe this product will be highly valuable to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I can only pay up to $8,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? This product is truly top-notch and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
Thank you for considering my situation, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $8,500 for the product.
